name: 2022 IEEE 22nd International Conference on Communication Technology (22nd IEEE ICCT)
content: Proceedings Publication: All accepted papers will be included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. ICCT 2022 is listed in IEEE conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/56141 Journal Publication: Accepted and presented papers of IEEE ICCT 2022 will be included into the conference proceedings of IEEE presented at the conference, after further revision. Selected papers will be invited to prepare extended version of a previously-published proceedings paper to journal. Digital Communications and Networks （ISSN： 2352-8648） CiteScore: 8.8 Impact Factor: 5.382 publishes rigorously peer-reviewed, high quality original articles and authoritative reviews that focus on communication systems and networks. All articles are published fully Open Access on ScienceDirect. The journal is indexed by Science Citation Index Expanded (SCIE) and Scopus.
